API Collection# AtomicRepresentable Implementations

## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/UnsafeMutableBufferPointer/AtomicRepresentable-Implementations#topics)

### [Type Aliases](/documentation/Swift/UnsafeMutableBufferPointer/AtomicRepresentable-Implementations#Type-Aliases)

[`typealias AtomicRepresentation`](/documentation/swift/unsafemutablebufferpointer/atomicrepresentation)The storage representation type that `Self` encodes to and decodes from which is a suitable type when used in atomic operations.### [Type Methods](/documentation/Swift/UnsafeMutableBufferPointer/AtomicRepresentable-Implementations#Type-Methods)

[`static func decodeAtomicRepresentation(consuming UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<Element>.AtomicRepresentation) -> UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<Element>`](/documentation/swift/unsafemutablebufferpointer/decodeatomicrepresentation(_:))Recovers the logical atomic type `Self` by destroying some `AtomicRepresentation` storage instance returned from an atomic operation.[`static func encodeAtomicRepresentation(consuming UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<Element>) -> UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<Element>.AtomicRepresentation`](/documentation/swift/unsafemutablebufferpointer/encodeatomicrepresentation(_:))Destroys a value of `Self` and prepares an `AtomicRepresentation` storage type to be used for atomic operations.
